column4: Hello, I have a problem installing Ubuntu 6.06 if anyone can review my pastebin I would be grateful, its at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/19389   Thanks
Try booting back into the livecd, and doing a grub-install on your main drive.
when I boot back into the livecd, I can't access or mount any of my disks even the partition where I installed Ubuntu
That seems odd. In that case, I don't know.
